QuestData.Title: Building Defenses
QuestData.Description:
We'll be able to push those monsters back now, but my defenders won't stand a chance unless we build a forward barricade for protection.
There should be plenty of lumber to build a barricade near the entrance to town.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect lumber to build forward barricades.
QuestData.CompletionText: We've pushed the front line out. That will give us some room.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you. We'll be better able to protect the town.
